pkgmetadata.longdescription: Functions to Fit Monotone Polynomials // Functions for fitting monotone polynomials to data. Detailed discussion of the methodologies used can be found in Murray, Mueller and Turlach (2013) doi:10.1007/s00180-012-0390-5 and Murray, Mueller and Turlach (2016) doi:10.1080/00949655.2016.1139582.
